title: Australian diary. No. 025
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The magazine items in this program features the growing pains of Sydney as the city develops and expands; training for women to become forestry officers in New South Wales; and a scientific expedition to Arnhem Land in the Northern Territory.
